availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary L. Norwood (Henderson County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Thomas Lambert and Eliza T. Lambert. Married Walter Norwood in Henderson, Kentucky on April 29, 1856. Mother of Eliza Norwood and Robenier Norwood. Resident in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 2, p. 12.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 85.Kentucky Marriage Records, Henderson County, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film 001944390, p. 113. Edmund L. Starling, History of Henderson County, Kentucky (Henderson, Kentucky, 1887), 559.
